title: Dream ship again
text: Flying round looking for something interesting, I spotted a pillar of smoke.
Landing near by, I see its my dream rocket ship again. Knowing that there are resources on this planet, I know I can fix it.
But I double check what I have on me just to be sure, not making that mistake again!
Fixing the ship was easy, almost seems wrong how easy.
Going to take it for a spin for a while before I leave the planet.
